baseRule.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṁ kupitā anattamanā saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṁ.
baseRule.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 113

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer zornig und verstimmt eine Nonne aus einer dem Orden gehörenden Wohnstätte hinauswirft oder hinauswerfen läßt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni, angry and displeased, evict a bhikkhuni from a dwelling belonging to the Community—or have her evicted—it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang, marah dan tidak senang, mengusir seorang Bhikkhuni dari sebuah tempat tinggal Saṅgha—atau telah mengusirnya—itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ kupito anattamano saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 17

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer zornig und verstimmt einen Mönch aus einer dem Orden gehörenden Wohnstätte hinauswirft oder hinauswerfen läßt, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk, in anger, throws a monk out of a dwelling belonging to the Sangha, or has him thrown out, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu, enfadado y descontento, expulsa o hace expulsar a otro bhikkhu de una morada perteneciente a la Comunidad: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。比丘房舍中。瞋恚忿心不喜。若自挽出。若使人挽出。如是言。出去滅去。汝不應是中住。是因緣故不異。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 16

fullParallels.text: 若比丘房內瞋忿不喜。牽出者。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 16

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻瞋恚不喜。於僧住處牽苾芻出。或令他牽出者。除餘緣故。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 16

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。瞋不喜於僧房中自牽比丘出。若使人牽作是語出去滅去莫此中住。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 16

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。知僧房內比丘先敷床褥。後來敷欲擾亂令去。作是因緣不異。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 17

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！瞋他比丘，不喜，僧房中，若自牽出，教他牽出，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 17

translations.text: If a monk get angry with another, and dislike his presence in the monks house, and so forcibly eject him, or get some one to eject him, this is Pācittiya.
17. Jika seorang bhikṣu menyeret bhikṣu lain yang tidak ia sukai dan dibencinya keluar dari sebuah ruangan di vihara atau menyuruh orang lain melakukannya, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘瞋他比丘不喜僧房。舍內若自牽出。若教人牽出。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 17

fullParallels.text: 若比丘知他比丘先住處。後來強鋪臥具宿。若嫌迮者自當去。以是因緣。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 16

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，瞋他比丘尼不喜，眾僧房中，自牽出、若教人牽出者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 17

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼瞋不喜。於僧坊中自牽比丘尼出。若使人牽作是語。出去滅去莫此中住。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 16

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。比丘尼房中瞋恨不喜。便自牽出。若使人牽。癡人遠去。不應住此。波夜提。除因緣。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 15

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼在僧房內。若自牽比丘尼出。若使人牽出。下至言比丘尼汝出去。作是語者波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 16
